page.pageTitle: 博士论文英语校对 - Webshop
page.pageDescription: 博士论文校对服务确保您的作品由英语母语人士以正确的科技美式英语撰写 - 博士论文校对-博士论文 |Elsevier Webshop

overviewPage.guaranteeBody: No matter what service you choose, Elsevier Author services are always guaranteed. If your manuscript is rejected due to an English proofreading issue, we will re-edit your paper for free or give you a full refund.
overviewPage.usp2Intro: We accept a wide range of documents and formats, such as journal articles, research papers, PhD theses, reports, books, grant applications, LaTeX format, and PowerPoint presentations.
overviewPage.whyBody:
Getting your manuscript accepted in any journal is challenging. All of your work and research will be evaluated, but that’s not all that’s considered. The quality of your writing and if it’s clear, concise and professional is just as important.

Our Editors have extensive background and expertise in research-editing and will help you increase your chances of being published. You can count on:
overviewPage.whyBody2: Your manuscript is safe with us; all editors sign a confidentiality agreement to make sure that your unpublished research is protected.
whyEditors: PhD or PhD candidates at top universities

doINeedLeft.title: Do I need Language Editing Services?
doINeedLeft.body: Once you finish your manuscript, it is important to have someone experienced in the field, and a native-English speaker, to review your work. This will increase the chances of your work getting published.

doINeedRight.body: Whether you are converting your thesis into a journal article or finishing the manuscript for your next research paper, your chances of success are linked to the quality and form of your presentation and the use of professional language. Our English Editing Services include proofreading and editing that will help you achieve success with your submission to any journal. Elsevier Language Editing includes language check: spelling, grammar, sentence structure, and terminology. Language Editing Plus service also includes unlimited re-editing, for up to 6 months.

pricesDeals.title: 价格
pricesDeals.body: 我们将负责语言校对，并确保您的论文完全没有语法、拼写和其他常见错误。

prices.title: Please contact us if your manuscript is longer than 12,000 words.

pricesDeals.title: 团购
pricesDeals.body: 个人、团体、学院或机构使用我们的英语语言校对、翻译或插图服务时，可享受特别折扣优惠。Elsevier 致力于长期为我们的客户提供支持，因此我们为常客（或同一机构的多个客户）设计了团购方案，从而为他们提供折扣与其他优惠。要了解有关团购方案的更多信息，请联系我们的团购团队。

node.body: You’re running out of time, and you need fast editing services for your manuscript. Language Editing Express is for you. Our editors are native-English speakers and field experts who will proofread and perform a detailed language check. Your manuscript will sound more professional, and you’ll feel more confident with your submission. All work will be completed within 1, 3 or 4 days, guaranteed.

node.body:
With Language Editing Plus you can count on a thorough language review of your manuscript, research paper, scientific presentation, or other work. Our editors are native-English speakers and PhD/PhD candidates who will help you get your manuscript ready for submission to a journal.

This service includes: a detailed language check, review of the logic and flow of your manuscript, reference checks, document formatting, a customized cover letter, an assessment report. This service is the most complete package we offer, and includes any English-editing needs for up to 180 days.

node.title: 研究与准备
node.subtitle: 打下坚实的基础
node.body: 找到理想的合作者，撰写成功的筹资申请，并借助 Elsevier 的工具和同行的心得体会来认真处理发表流程。

node.title: 撰写
node.subtitle: 传达您的信息
node.body: 提高您的学术写作技巧，完善您的学术引用规范，确保您的作品质量，使用视觉效果扩大影响力。

node.title: 提交
node.subtitle: 发表您的作品
node.body: 借助 Elsevier 的培训、建议和工具来找到适合您论文的期刊，负责任且广泛地分享您的研究数据，并探索您的发表选择方案。

node.title: 发表后
node.subtitle: 务让您的研究脱颖而出
node.body: 借助 Elsevier 的产品、工具和培训来提高您的作品可见性和可搜索性，在线分享您的研究，监控您的发表情况并庆祝成功。
